title: Hungary Plays Spoiler in Europe as Orban Strains for Votes at Home
summary_full: Facing a serious election challenge, Prime Minister Viktor Orban is holding up a big E.U. loan for Ukraine. Analysts say the timing is no coincidence.
summary_public: Facing a serious election challenge, Prime Minister Viktor Orban is holding up a big E.U. loan for Ukraine. Analysts say the timing is no coincidence.

HU.evidence: Orban is holding up a big E.U. loan for Ukraine.
